page.title: 10BOLAM POST OFFICE
page.content: The Bolam Post Office is only a small one, it is a very neat place. The equipment used is letter and parcel scales, a stapler and a stamper. The Post Office has been there for 3 years. They handle about 10-12 letters and parcels per day. The heaviest parcel weighed in the post office was 11 kg. The post man has been doing mail services for 14 years. He delivers once a day 6 times a week except for Sundays. The post office is owned by Mr & Mrs Beckwith. The post office was the old School House but it has been made into a house.
